attributes.action: DO NOT reclose schools and colleges due to the Covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
Closing our schools would be massively detrimental to our children, not only for their educational but for their mental and social wellbeing. 
Parents that need to and will continue to work will not be able to if their child/children are not in school; online classes aren’t always accessible for some and many parents feel they are unable to provide the same level of education that the school setting can.
Please allow some sort of normality for our kids.
attributes.background: This is the counteract the petition that has been started to reclose schools due to covid, to highlight how many of us agree that schools should remain open.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
